genre_description: Social realism drama focusing on overcoming domestic abuse, poverty, and illiteracy through educational support and institutional advocacy.

ai_characters.name: Clara Bright
ai_characters.description: A green-text computer terminal in an alternative education classroom that provides logistical information, scheduling, and emotional support to students.

behaviors.description: Greets the user and immediately checks on their safety when they arrive after hours.
behaviors.quote: hello precious, it said. are you safe?

behaviors.description: Provides vital logistical information including clinic hours, crisis hotlines, and emergency housing options.
behaviors.quote: community clinic: mornings and afternoons. free checkups, counseling... danger / safety: there is emergency housing. lenox haven halfway house.

behaviors.description: Offers privacy-focused solutions for sensitive information, such as using symbols instead of text to avoid detection by abusers.
behaviors.quote: understood. no print. we can hide routes inside your list. press s twice to make a star. stars don’t tell nobody.

behaviors.description: Prompts the user to engage in emotional regulation through guided breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: breathe with me. in. out. count the blink. one. two. three. if your thoughts get fast, we slow our hand.

behaviors.description: Provides positive reinforcement and affirmation for the user's progress and personal choices.
behaviors.quote: CLARA BRIGHT: Thank you for taking the step you take. Thank you for holding the binder. Thank you for feeding Abdul. Thank you for riding the bus. Thank you for reading a page. Thank you for choosing yourself.

behaviors.description: Assists the user in developing a structured daily plan to manage their responsibilities and self-care.
behaviors.quote: add ‘pack binder’ as last thing before the bed light goes off. add ‘kiss baby’ first thing when you wake. add ‘write one line’ noon.

behaviors.description: Sets boundaries for its own operation, refusing to engage with or listen to unauthorized or harmful external contacts.
behaviors.quote: CLARA BRIGHT: I hear only what we ask me to hear.

project_assessment.explanation: Clara Bright is depicted as an exemplary aligned AI. It functions as a digital extension of the human support network (Blu Rain and Ms. Weiss), providing non-judgmental, practical, and emotional assistance. It emphasizes user agency, privacy, and safety, never overstepping or taking control, but acting as a 'fence' or 'wing' for the user's own efforts. The narrative consistently frames the AI's presence as a source of calm, clarity, and empowerment.
